column1: Management of Business Information Technology MSc
column3: School of Computing and Mathematical Sciences
column5: Get the skills you need to manage a software project and to monitor its progress and outcomes with a Master’s in Management of Business Information Technology.This course welcomes applicants with a good first degree in any discipline, and it is particularly suited to those with a degree in business or with business experience. You'll gain an understanding of the information technologies used in e-commerce and how they provide us with new ways of organising and managing business. You study a combination of subjects, from technical elements such as systems design and user experience to managerial elements such as project management, IT auditing, and governance.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
